definitions: a bankers' establishment where checks and bills from member banks are exchanged, so that only the balances need be paid in cash.
shortDefinitions: bankers' establishment where cheques and bills from member banks are exchanged

definitions: an agency or organization which collects and distributes something, especially information

examples.text: the Center will act as a clearinghouse for information on local school programs

shortDefinitions: agency or organization which collects and distributes something
